metadata.title: CVE-2022-24976 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: Atheme IRC Services before 7.2.12, when used in conjunction with InspIRCd, allows authentication bypass by ending an IRC handshake at a certain point during a challenge-response login sequence.

criterions.comment: atheme-services package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
